name: ParticipantRegistry

commentData.description: The ParticipantRegistry is used to manage a set of participants stored on the blockchain.

tags.description: See [Registry]{@link module:composer-client.Registry}

methods.name: getAllParticipantRegistries

commentData.description: Get a list of all existing participant registries.

tags.title: return
tags.description:
A promise that will be resolved with a list of {@link ParticipantRegistry}
instances representing the participant registries.
